channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Plane with 2 aboard crashes in Philadelphia and sets multiple homes ablaze
item.description: A medical transport jet crashed in Philadelphia on Friday about 30 seconds after taking off, setting homes ablaze and unleashing a fireball into the night sky. Two people were on board, the Federal Aviation Administration said.
item.content:encoded:
A medical transport jet crashed in Philadelphia on Friday about 30 seconds after taking off, setting homes ablaze and unleashing a fireball into the night sky. Two people were on board, the Federal Aviation Administration said.

(Image credit: Matt Rourke)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: Map: A look at helicopter traffic patterns over D.C.
item.description: The airspace above Reagan National Airport, where a commercial plane collided with an Army helicopter this week, has become increasingly congested with air traffic, including helicopters.
item.content:encoded: The airspace above Reagan National Airport, where a commercial plane collided with an Army helicopter this week, has become increasingly congested with air traffic, including helicopters.
item.dc:creator: Emma Bowman

item.title: Oscar-nominated actress Karla Sofía Gascón apologizes for old social media posts
item.description: The first openly trans actress to be nominated for an Oscar is facing backlash for old social media posts that denigrate certain marginalized groups. She apologized for the posts through a statement.
item.content:encoded:
The first openly trans actress to be nominated for an Oscar is facing backlash for old social media posts that denigrate certain marginalized groups. She apologized for the posts through a statement.

(Image credit: Etienne Laurent)
item.dc:creator: Dhanika Pineda

item.title: Federal websites down as agencies implement executive order 'defending women'
item.description: After the president singed an executive order "defending women against gender ideology extremism," several federal government websites on gender and sexual health disappear.
item.content:encoded:
After the president singed an executive order "defending women against gender ideology extremism," several federal government websites on gender and sexual health disappear.

(Image credit: Evan Vucci)
item.dc:creator: Danielle Kurtzleben

item.title: 5 things to know about the fighting in the Democratic Republic of Congo
item.description: Rwandan-backed M23 rebels say they are now in control of the key eastern Congolese city of Goma. Their fighters continue to claim more territory in one of the world's most mineral-rich territories.
item.content:encoded:
Rwandan-backed M23 rebels say they are now in control of the key eastern Congolese city of Goma. Their fighters continue to claim more territory in one of the world's most mineral-rich territories.

(Image credit: Brian Inganga)
item.dc:creator: Emmet Livingstone

item.title: Texas is Trump's biggest – and most enthusiastic – partner on immigration overhaul
item.description: Gov. Greg Abbott this week directed state agencies to work with federal immigration authorities to crack down on illegal immigration.
item.content:encoded:
Gov. Greg Abbott this week directed state agencies to work with federal immigration authorities to crack down on illegal immigration.

(Image credit: Anadolu/Anadolu via Getty Images)
item.dc:creator: Ana Campbell

item.title: Trump administration purges websites across federal health agencies
item.description: Research and basic information on subjects ranging from tuberculosis surveillance to adolescent health disappeared from federal health agency websites.
item.content:encoded:
Research and basic information on subjects ranging from tuberculosis surveillance to adolescent health disappeared from federal health agency websites.


(Image credit: Will Stone)
item.dc:creator: Will Stone

item.title: FAA restricts helicopter flights near DCA airport after mid-air collision
item.description: Federal authorities have restricted helicopter flights near Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport. The move comes days after a deadly collision between a passenger jet and a military helicopter.
item.content:encoded:
Federal authorities have restricted helicopter flights near Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport. The move comes days after a deadly collision between a passenger jet and a military helicopter.

(Image credit: Kayla Bartkowski)
item.dc:creator: Joel Rose

item.title: Conflicting signals from Trump could disrupt HIV meds. What's the impact?
item.description: A series of orders from the Trump administration have the potential to disrupt the delivery of life-saving medications to HIV positive people. Here's what a disruption of this drug regimen would mean.
item.content:encoded:
A series of orders from the Trump administration have the potential to disrupt the delivery of life-saving medications to HIV positive people. Here's what a disruption of this drug regimen would mean.

(Image credit: Donwilson Odhiambo/SOPA Images/LightRocket via Getty Images)
item.dc:creator: Ari Daniel

item.title: International regulators probe how DeepSeek is using data. Is the app safe to use?
item.description: The Chinese chatbot took the world by storm and rattled stock markets. But lost in all the attention was a focus on how the company is collecting and storing data.
item.content:encoded:
The Chinese chatbot took the world by storm and rattled stock markets. But lost in all the attention was a focus on how the company is collecting and storing data.

(Image credit: Andy Wong)
item.dc:creator: Bobby Allyn
